name: Social Dream Foundation(SDF)

address: Near water tank, Ward N. 4, Dhalwala, Post-Munikireti,

briefDescription: Social Dream Foundation is a non-profit constructive voluntary organisation which is registered under Indian societies registration act 21 of 1860. Due to various dilemmas in the society creative voluntary youth social workers established it in 2007, which were organized from Dalit and disadvantaged community with a view to create occasions for Dalit & disadvantaged of the remote and neglected rural & urban areas to guide a further self-dependent existence wherein they are able to decrease poverty and live in harmony with their better environment. Social and Dream words was taken to wish better state and track of the peoples and signifies a build and growth a society. One hoped that the organization that was named Social Dream Foundation,
